infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location to show customers where you are and navigate to pickups.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We need background location to update your position while driving to pickups.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow NELA to use your location to show customers where you are and navigate to pickups.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow NELA to track your location in the background while you're on a trip.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow NELA to use your location to show customers where you are.

plugins.photosPermission: The app needs access to your photos to upload profile and vehicle images.
